  • Uses of Action in game

    Subclasses of Action in game 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AimSniperAction  
    class  AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class  ChantAction
    ChantAction allows the actor that executes it to spawn in 5 zombies and random locations on the map.
    class  CraftAction
    An Action that takes an instance of a parent Item and a child Item and performs the action of removing the parent Item and adding the child Item to the game, depending on whether it was called on an Item on the Map or in an Actor's inventory.
    class  EatFoodAction
    An Action that heals the Actor that calls this method and removes the consumed Food from the map or Actor inventory.
    class  FertiliseAction
    An action that fertilises a Crop at a given location.
    class  HarvestAction
    Action that harvests the Crop at a given Location.
    class  QuitAction
    QuitAction allows the player to quit the game.
    class  SelectShotgunDirectionAction
    Allows the player to select a direction for shooting the shotgun.
    class  SelectTargetActorAction  
    class  ShootShotgunAction
    Action that corresponds to shooting the shotgun, calculating the area of damage affected and dealing damage to all affected Actors, good or bad.
    class  ShootSniperAction  
    class  SowAction
    Action that changes the Ground at the target Location to Crop.
    class  TeleportAction
    Moves an Actor to a Location within the game world.
    class  VanishAction
    VanishAction allows MamboMarie to vanish from the map and adds an item tracker that allows MamboMarie to come back to the map.

    Action Zombie.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    If there is a WeaponItem at the location of the Zombie, if the Zombie does not currently have a weapon in their inventory and has at least 1 arm, then they must pick up the WeaponItem.
